name: UXD Front-end References and Utilities
tagline: List of Plugins for Front-end Development
body:
# UXD Front-end References and Utilities

## Front-end framework
* [Bootstrap](http://getbootstrap.com/)
* [Foundation Zurb](http://foundation.zurb.com/)
* [Material Design Lite](http://www.getmdl.io/index.html)

## Front-end List of Component Plugins
* [http://codepen.io/](http://codepen.io/)
* [jQuery Rain](http://www.jqueryrain.com/)
* [Codrops](http://tympanus.net/codrops/)
* [Codyhouse](https://codyhouse.co/)

## Navigation Menu Plugins
* [Line Menu Styles](http://tympanus.net/codrops/2016/01/06/inspiration-for-line-menu-styles/)

## Table Plugins
* [DataTables](https://datatables.net/)
* [Bootstrap Custom Table ](http://issues.wenzhixin.net.cn/bootstrap-table/index.html)

## Date and Time picker Plugins
* [Bootstrap Date Picker](https://github.com/eternicode/bootstrap-datepicker)
* [Bootstrap Date and Time Picker](http://eonasdan.github.io/bootstrap-datetimepicker/)

## Animation Plugins
* [Scroll Reveal Animation](https://scrollrevealjs.org/)
* [Animate CSS](https://daneden.github.io/animate.css/)
* [WOW Animate CSS](http://mynameismatthieu.com/WOW/)

## Icons Animation Plugins
* [Conate Transform Icons](http://bitshadow.github.io/iconate/)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
